auth.name: Name
auth.privacyNote: Your data is private and secure. We never share your personal information.

dashboard.worthyOfLove: You are worthy of love and gentleness.
dashboard.welcomeBackToSafeSpace: Welcome back to your safe space.
dashboard.howCanISupport: How can I support you today?

checkIn.title: How are you feeling?
checkIn.description: There's no right or wrong way to feel. This is simply a moment to pause and acknowledge where you are.
checkIn.whatEmotionClosest: What emotion feels closest right now?
checkIn.affirmation: Your feelings are valid and you deserve compassion, especially from yourself.

wins.title: Your wins
wins.description: Celebrating progress, no matter how small. Each win is a testament to your strength and resilience.

journal.title: Journal
journal.safeSpaceThoughts: A safe space for your thoughts
journal.description: Let your thoughts flow freely. This is your private space to process, reflect, and release.
journal.howToExpress: How would you like to express yourself?

prompts.gratefulFor: What am I grateful for today?
prompts.showedKindness: How did I show myself kindness?
prompts.needToRelease: What do I need to release?
prompts.tellYoungerSelf: What would I tell my younger self?

affirmations.title: Daily affirmations
affirmations.description: Gentle reminders of your worth, strength, and beauty. Let these words wrap around you like a warm embrace.
affirmations.reflectionPrompt: How does this affirmation land with you today? What feelings or thoughts come up?

resources.title: Resource garden
resources.description: A collection of healing resources, stories, and tools created by and for women of color on their wellness journeys.
resources.suggestDescription: Know of a resource that would help others? We'd love to hear about it.

softLanding.title: Soft landing
softLanding.description: Take a moment to ground yourself. Choose what feels most supportive right now.
softLanding.crisisDescription: If you're in crisis, please reach out for professional help.

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.notReplacementTherapy: This app is not a replacement for professional therapy.
disclaimer.affirmation: You deserve support, care, and healing. You are not alone in this journey.
